name: Castle Isolation
description:
Once, there was one little castle run by a princess. Her servants loved the princess and served her with faith and truth. But hard times came, food became less, and on the lands of the princess came disease. And now they are forced to hide in the castle, waiting for the moment when the gods will help them and defeat the disease or until they take it with them.

Left in comments how many days you survived.

Programing: Diccuric_Sigeon
Art: enemy_fiend, Awrelia
Audio: natpies
